survey_name: Electric Bicycle Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric bicycle users to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard frequency scale for consistency. Ensure the options cover all possible usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use your electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using an electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses. Consider adding a text field if 'Other' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (SINGLE_CHOICE)

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using an electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for satisfaction questions.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see improved in your electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to gather comprehensive feedback on desired improvements.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see improved in your electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions you have regarding your electric bicycle experience.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions can provide valuable qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions you have regarding your electric bicycle experience.
